html:
4.23.20  12:41 am   is pineapple on pizza a sin?

      they are both sins individually. but when you put them together they are eraser of all sins

4.23.20  12:38 am   Why is life life?

      because you said

4.23.20  12:37 am   What is google?

      free friendship

4.23.20  12:33 am   Can I borrow Twenty bucks?

      sure

4.23.20  12:29 am   If my nameis rob, does doing my name makes me a robber?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

4.23.20  12:27 am   Can you give me an existential crisis?

      sure but not on purpose. those things are contagious

4.23.20  12:23 am   If you put a seat belt on does that mean you are wearing a car?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

4.23.20  12:08 am   You always upload new songs on bad days and I was just wondering how you know when I'm having a bad day.

     you may be on some sort of schedule which causes you to have bad days on Tuesdays

      Are you spying on me?

     no

4.22.20  10:37 pm   can you answer a riddle for me?

      sure

4.22.20  10:34 pm   What's your biggest pet peeve?

      i prefer not to keep peeves as pets. i believe peeves should run wild, and free

4.22.20  10:31 pm   What's your favorite thing 

      the 'item'

4.22.20  10:18 pm   How would you define "pop" music?

      normal

4.22.20  10:18 pm   are you ever going to make more videos for the reality section?

      yes extremely

4.22.20  10:12 pm   Greetings Bill, I hope you're doing well.  I just stumbled across your content and it brightens my day in these dark times.  I can't get enough of "Just Did a Bad Thing".  Thank you for your prolific entertainment.  My question:

If you could forget a new language, what wouldn't you remember?

      how to speak read or hear it

4.22.20  10:02 pm   are you a bannana

      no

4.22.20  9:42 pm   bill thanks for being such an authentic person. i think the earth needs more of those. or at least people who try to do that 

      there may be more people trying to do that than you may realize

4.22.20  9:39 pm   Does not Steve use Velcro?

      oh that would explain a lot

4.22.20  9:27 pm   what speed is fast?

      8 or 10 maybe

4.22.20  9:24 pm   IS COMMUNISM REAL?

      so far i have only seen it in the mirror

4.22.20  9:23 pm   are u working on a project rn

      'project' seems somehow too small to describe what i am going through

4.22.20  9:20 pm   do you are is stupid?

      i have that on my resumé, which i don't use because it's stupid

4.22.20  9:08 pm   what is the internet?

      a way to go so far onto the computer that you actually go way off the computer

4.22.20  8:42 pm   How does one answer a hard question?

      flip around in spirals for a bit. then take a hard side turn. then see what you have

4.22.20  8:39 pm   What's Happening at the airport Terminal?

      could be some renovations

4.22.20  8:10 pm   what should i do to feel less tired in the morning

      you'll have to sleep more, at another time

4.22.20  7:41 pm   Hey, Bill how are you doing today? Do dreams inspire your music?

      sometimes

4.22.20  7:21 pm   what songs do you recommend?

      all of them

4.22.20  7:20 pm   if you like huge bread i assume you like huge pasta so what do you think of small pasta

      too big

4.22.20  7:02 pm   why are parallel lines sad?

      because they never meet

4.22.20  6:59 pm   What inspires you to make music?

      literally everything

4.22.20  6:27 pm   What should i draw?

      a pencil

4.22.20  6:05 pm   If I wanna make a song with a guitar but I'm bad at playing the guitar should I make it with the guitar or without the guitar or just featuring the guitar?

      hm, all of those options may have certain benefits. it may be time for a random number selection (1 to 3). any choice sounds like a winning move here

4.22.20  5:49 pm   Is there something faster than light?

      only you

4.22.20  5:45 pm   Do you think birds can wear underwea?r

      only if they wear something else also, over it

4.22.20  5:21 pm   What do I do if I was in a bad situation?

      make some folklore

4.22.20  5:16 pm   I do not know who I am or what I am. How does one find this out for themselves?

      i don't know, but it's impossible to not find out

4.22.20  5:13 pm   how's progress on whatever you're working on?

      good but i'm scared

4.22.20  4:40 pm   I've always been wondering if you do bpm/rhythm math to calculate the exact timings of visuals or if you line it up with isolated tracks?

      i line it up with the audio, which is all on 1 stereo track during the video process. or maybe 2 or 3 if there are different temp components but there is no need to isolate them

4.22.20  4:39 pm   Thoughts on sci-fi?

      so real

4.22.20  4:16 pm   ok but are command strips better than velcro?

      surprise, i have some command strips that are velcro

4.22.20  4:16 pm   Favorite guitar string?

      the fret board

4.22.20  3:02 pm   When did time start?

      seems like just only a little while ago

4.22.20  3:01 pm   In /California/ what can you smoke?

      sunshine

4.22.20  2:58 pm   hi i live on saturn and I was wondering is loving your videos legal yet

      almost. the legislations are being rammed through the system, so to speak

4.22.20  2:55 pm   how high can you climb up a ladder?

      to the other side

4.22.20  2:35 pm   are u a human

      oh that would explain a lot

4.22.20  1:59 pm   what's a good song you have listened to that you would recommend others listen to?

      all songs, i would recommend be listened to. if i single one out now, that would ruin the integrity of such a magical game

4.22.20  1:41 pm   how do you write scripts for you videos? (seriously)

      i have to imagine exactly what i want the video to say. and write that down. and usually also link to a video/audio demo of me describing and/or demonstrating it in more detail, to supplement the textual script

4.22.20  1:19 pm   is the day going on?

      oh that would explain a lot

4.22.20  1:09 pm   how do I know when the pancakes done

      when it's flat enough. you need to flatten it more still
